overview:
GeoRiot is a redirection and translation platform designed to solve the linking issues that global brands with geographically segmented storefronts and affiliate programs face.

The geographic segmentation between digital storefronts and affiliate programs of large, international companies results in poor user experience, lost commissions, and inadequate reporting. International brands struggle with poor user experience because differences in the product catalog between countries result in a deep link for one store typically not working in another. A developer or publisher using a single, country specific affiliate program is unable to earn commissions on sales from international traffic. Also, by using multiple affiliate networks, developers and publishers can’t easily compare reports from multiple geos.

GeoRiot allows publishers and developers to use all of the affiliate programs for a global brand simultaneously, while also ensuring that each click results in a link localized for each consumerâ€™s national store.

A click on a GeoRiot enabled link is instantly processed in three steps. First, the service geo-targets where the consumer is coming from to determine their national storefront. Second, the service translates the link to work for the consumer’s storefront and directs them to the best match of the desired item. Finally, the new link is affiliate encoded so commissions can be earned on all potential subsequent sales.
